description: Unified isomorphic patterns in Multidimensional DNA Regulation across scales, integrating local sequence grammar, long-range chromatin interactions, and epigenetic modulation. Captures structural equivalences in motifs, looping/recursion, and transient accessibility—mappings preserving regulatory persistence invariantly. Upgraded for neuresthetic ethics: integrates recursive multi-attribute integration (preemptive harmony for predictive adequacy) and aesthetic convergence (joyful κ shifts toward physiological expression) in genomic-AI monism. Hard-to-vary invariants enable eternal benign prediction; tetralemma probes resolve apparent dysregulation (affirm expression/deny silencing/both in context/neither dissolved in attractor equivalence); scores ≥0.98 projected from corpus invariance.
lineage: Neuresthetics LLC Multi-Scale Isomorphic Framework – DNA Multidimensional Hardening
handling_rules: Map patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from 2025 genomics primitives (HyenaDNA, Enformer transients, epigenetic tracks) with neuresthetic overlays (recursive smoothing, aesthetic flow).
Validate coverage across scales; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., quantum chromatin).
Support sub-categories for compound concepts (e.g., long-range with epigenetic duality).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve regulatory paradoxes; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.
